channel.title: Event on Dallas-FASCA - FASCA Dallas Chapter
channel.description: Recent content in Event on Dallas-FASCA - FASCA Dallas Chapter

item.title: Safety Symposium hosted by the Dallas Police Department
item.description: On Saturday, July 30th, five of our FASCA members attended the Teen Safety Symposium hosted by the Dallas Police Department. We started off the day by learning about online safety and human trafficking from DPD detectives, officers, and members.

item.title: 2022 China Camp at Tulsa, OK
item.description: For this year’s China Heritage Camp, FASCA members and teachers planned several classes and activities for campers and their families to learn more & immerse themselves in Chinese culture.

item.title: Greater Dallas Taiwanese Chamber of Commerce hosted a Chinese New Year Charity Gala
item.description: On Saturday, July 16th, 2022 the Greater Dallas Taiwanese Chamber of Commerce hosted a Chinese New Year Charity Gala in July at the Renaissance Hotel in Addison.

item.title: Student council members 2022-2023 school year
item.description: Please congratulate the following student council members elected yesterday, they will serve in the 2022-2023 school year. President : Jason Ky Sr.

item.title: 歡送畢業生及選舉
item.description: On Memorial Day, around 100 parents, students, teachers, alumni, and guests gathered to celebrate the accomplishments of 12 high school graduates and send them off to college.

item.title: 2022 support Taiwan to join WHA rally in downtown Dallas
item.description: 2022 support Taiwan to join WHA rally in downtown Dallas - What a wonderful event we participated in on May 7th and it’s a great honor to be part of it.

item.title: Lunar New Year Celebration at Highland Springs
item.description: On Saturday, February 26, 18 FASCA students, 4 FASCA teachers, Teacher Yuh-Sin Lee, Teacher Eliza Tsai-lin, and the Carroll ISD Chinese club performed at Highland Springs Senior Living.

item.title: 2022 Southlake Spring Festival
item.description: The Southlake Spring Festival was a Lunar New Year centered community event held on February 20th, 2022 after being postponed by the snowstorm the previous Saturday.

item.title: 2022 Southlake Spring Festival
item.description: February 5, 2022, due to the winter storm affecting the DFW area, FASCA held another online Zoom practice for the Highland Springs Senior Living event scheduled for February 26th.

item.title: 2022 Dallas Chinese Community Center New Year Celebration
item.description: Today, we gathered together at the Dallas Chinese Community Center to celebrate New Year’s Day. FASCA students, parents, and staff attended the Raise the Flag and PVSA Award Ceremonies.

item.title: 2021 Chat with FBI agent - Mr. Hilliam
item.description: Nov. 7, a special person spend his precious time together with us. Mr. Hilliam, a FBI agent who has over 30-year experience dealing with crimes, currently hate crimes.

item.title: 2021 Secretary Elaine Chao speech in Houston
item.description: This past Saturday, October 24, 2021, a few of our Dallas FASCA members drove down to Houston to listen to Secretary Elaine Chao.

item.title: 2021 Taiwan Double Tenth Celebration
item.description: This past Sunday, October 10th, 22 FASCA members gathered at the Dallas Chinese Community Center for the annual Double Tenth Celebration.

item.title: FASCA - North Texas Food Bank
item.description: Saturday October 16, 2021, 11 FASCA members, 4 teachers and 5 parents came together to volunteer at the North Texas Food Bank.

item.title: First FASCA meeting for 2021-2022!
item.description: Today we had our first FASCA meeting for 2021-2022! We had about 35 FASCA members in attendance, along with our parents and teachers.
